Just Curly Cute STRENGTHENING MUD MASK

Brand: Just Curly Cute!

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aloe Vera Juice, Bentonite Clay, Kaolin Clay, Kosher Vegetable Glycerin, Coconut Oil, Flax Seed Oil, Olive Oil.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
